# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(input::String; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input)
    result = ""
    line_length = 0
    for word in words
        if line_length + length(word) > text_width
            result *= '\n'
            line_length = 0
        end
        result *= word * " "
        line_length += length(word) + 1
    end
    return result
end
```

Example:
```julia
wrap_string("This is a test of the wrap_string function in Julia", text_width=10)
```
